heading: About Me
info:
Degree: Bachelors of Arts in Elementary Education (2021) 
 With Reading and Special Education endorsments 
    -William Penn University
body: Aundrea (Whitlatch-Hiemstra) Barnes is an Elementary Education Major with Endorsements in Reading and Special Education. Aundrea is a fourth-year student at William Penn University with plans of teaching 2nd or 3rd grade. She plans to student teach the fall of 2021. She is involved in many different activities involving William Penn University such as Marching Band, Pep Band, Concert Band, Choir, Education Club, Alpha Eta Omega Sorority, and works as an assistant in the Service Center on campus. In her â€‹free time, she loves reading, coloring, and spending time with her family.
